thread.title: Musk: Most Tesla problems cited by Consumer Reports already fixed
thread.title_full: Musk: Most Tesla problems cited by Consumer Reports already fixed - San Francisco Chronicle

author: David R. Baker
title: Musk: Most Tesla problems cited by Consumer Reports already fixed
text:
Photo: Yuriko Nakao, Bloomberg Elon Musk, chief executive officer of Tesla Motors, holds the charging nozzle as he demonstrates the company's Model S electric sedan following a news conference in Tokyo, Japan, on Monday, Sept. 8, 2014. Photographer: Yuriko Nakao/Bloomberg Elon Musk, chief executive officer of Tesla Motors, holds the...
Tesla Motors CEO Elon Musk on Wednesday said the electric automaker had already fixed most of the reliability problems that prompted Consumer Reports to withdraw its recommendation of the company’s Model S electric sedan. Elon Musk, chief executive officer of Tesla Motors, holds the charging nozzle as he demonstrates the company's Model S electric sedan following a news conference in Tokyo, Japan, on Monday, Sept. 8, 2014. Photographer: Yuriko Nakao/Bloomberg Elon Musk, chief executive officer of Tesla Motors, holds the...
Tesla Motors CEO Elon Musk on Wednesday said the electric automaker had already fixed most of the reliability problems that prompted Consumer Reports to withdraw its recommendation of the company’s Model S electric sedan.
